metadata.title: CVE-2015-1308 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: kde-workspace 4.2.0 and plasma-workspace before 5.1.95 allows remoteattackers to obtain input events, and consequently obtain passwords, byleveraging access to the X server when the screen is locked.

criterions.comment: kde-workspace: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
